rules.description: Swedish keyboard, AltGr+key_left_of_z => Right option+7 (pipe character |)
Right option / right command / right control + arrows = mediakeys
Page down on right command (which is swapped to option)
⏪ (back track) key should only control Music.
⏩ (next track) key should only control Music.
Fn+⏪ (back track) key should only control Music.
Fn+⏯ (play/pause) key should only control Music.
Fn+⏩ (next trackx) key should only control Music.
